title: How farmer's in India's Sundarbans area are using climate smart agriculture

tasks.task: Arrive at and inspect a climate-resilient agriculture project in Bongeri, South 24 Parganas, West Bengal.
subtasks: Navigate to Bongeri village post-cyclone devastation.
Verify the region's recovery from the 2009 Cyclone Islay.
Evaluate the project initiated by the National Initiative on Climate Resilient Agriculture.
Assess the adoption of European soybean varieties.
Observe the integration of native plants and agroforestry practices.
Review water management techniques and nutrition costs.
Perform soil testing and analyze results.
Implement strategies to reduce chemical inputs based on soil analysis.
Monitor the progress of pisciculture (fish farming) efforts.
Evaluate community well-being and project success indicators.
